body.p: Oxygen Feedback comes with support for the following built-in languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Dutch, and Chinese. The default language that is used in the Oxygen Feedback user interface depends on your browser's settings.

To change the language displayed in the Oxygen Feedback interface, specify the desired language in your browser settings and reload the Oxygen Feedback page.If Oxygen Feedback does not support the language specified in your browser's settings, it will revert to English.
